resources.string: Search for the exact name first, then search for a partial name if there\'s no results
Stop at the results page even if there is only one result
Skip the results page and go directly to the game if there is only one result
Allows searching from the Quick Search Box. (This has been disabled in recent versions of Android.)
Start editing the player after adding
Add it when you need it
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Are you sure you want to clear all synchronized information? NOTE: This operation can\'t be reversed. But you can re-sync.
Clear unsuccessful - are you sure you\'re signed in\?

This will force a complete sync on collection data. Normally only recently modified collection items are synced. This may take a while, but it is recommended if all collection items aren\'t appearing.
This will force a complete sync on play data. Normally only recent plays are synced. This may take a while, but it is recommended if all plays aren\'t appearing.
This will delete all GeekBuddies, then force a complete sync. This may take a while, but it is recommended if all GeekBuddies aren\'t appearing.
Sync failed - are you sure you\'re signed in\?
Show relative times for all dates associated with forums (when the time is recent)
Always show absolute date/time for all dates associated with forums
Leave this off if you\'re not experiencing crashes
This should reduce the frequency of crashes. Sorry if you still see some.
Polls for games will no longer work, but hopefully the crashes will stop. (This has nothing to do with polls in forums - those will never work.)
Leave this on if you\'re not crashing
Leave this off if you\'re not crashing
You will see the details of a crash in the notification bar - send this info to the developers!
Export the data that\'s not available via syncing with the \'Geek

This will export the data below by replacing the existing files in %s. Are you sure you want to continue?

- Game colors
- Player colors
- Collection views
Import data from a previous export
This will replace any data already loaded with data in files from %s. Are you sure you want to continue?
Import file doesn\'t exist or can\'t be read.

What\'s New?

Coming Soon
  • Export/import some data (under Advanced Settings)
  • Improve list usability
  • Updated look and feel of nav drawer
  • Time-based data is updated automatically (e.g. 5 mins ago becomes 6 mins ago)
  • Fix forum and GeekList links and images
  • Bug fixes and stability improvements
5.0.2
  • Darken font in a couple of areas for readability
  • Cap game\'s plays per month at total play count
  • More bug fixes and stability improvements
5.0.1
  • Suppress H-Index notification if it\'s 0
  • Bug fixes and stability improvements
5.0
  • Material design and support for Android Lollipop
  • GeekLists
  • Play stats
  • Improved sync and sync notification messages
  • Use Google Now to search by voice by saying \"search game name on BoardGameGeek\"
  • Access and edit play locations, players, and stats from the navigation drawer
  • Zoom and pan game images
  • Default collection view shows only items you\'ve requested to sync
  • Sort collection by rank
  • Filter collection by play count
  • Quick log multiple plays when viewing a list
  • Probably lots of other improvements
  • Miscellaneous bug fixes
4.8.4
  • Fixed syncing (again!)
4.8.3
  • Syncing improvements (fewer 503s)
4.8.2
  • Fixed displaying images
4.8.1
  • Fixed incorrect statistics (including rating)
  • Can now select a random game from a buddy\'s collection
  • Miscellaneous bug fixes
4.8
  • Now syncs played games that aren\'t otherwise in your collection
  • Now syncs accessories (though this will break the base game/expansion filter until the next complete collection sync)
  • Lots of usability improvements around logging plays
  • View all players along with GeekBuddies
  • Completely rewritten syncing logic
4.7.3
  • Fix crashes in forums and ordering players
  • Change look and feel of navigation drawer
  • Modernize the look of the slider in the filter dialog
  • Show the collection properly when adding a shortcut
4.7.2
  • Fix crash when viewing buddy collection
  • Don\'t allow clicking on forum header
  • When saving a view, enable the Save button correctly
  • When deleting a view, go back to the default view
  • Improve format of forum for narrow screens
  • Clicking the h-index notification takes you to a BGG thread
4.7.1
  • No more crashes
  • What was new in previous versions?

Special thanks to BoardGameGeek. We\'re not affiliated with them, but this app wouldn\'t be possible without their support and permission. Follow the thread there.
DragSortListView (DSLV) is an extension of the Android ListView that enables drag-and-drop reordering of list items.
Android optimized event bus that simplifies communication between Activities, Fragments, Threads, Services, etc. Less code, better quality.
Annotation-triggered method call logging for your debug builds.
Implementation of ImageView for Android that supports zooming, by various touch gestures.
A slider widget for Android allowing to set a minimum and maximum value on a numerical range.
An android library for section headers that stick to the top.
Androidicons is a professional, handcrafted icon set with 250 icons in 14 different colors and 5 sizes, including an icon font and all sources.
